GL.MIN_FIRST_AMT: This is the minimum amount that may be entered when making first deposit using this processor.
GL.MAX_FIRST_AMT: This is the maximum amount that may be entered when making first deposit using this processor.

GPL.MIN_FIRST_AMT: This is the minimum amount that may be entered when making first deposit using this processor. This is for any player that has no overrides specified in IPL / PL.
GPL.MAX_FIRST_AMT: This is the maximum amount that may be entered when making first deposit using this processor. This is for any player that has no overrides specified in IPL / PL.

PL.MIN_FIRST_AMT: This is the minimum amount that may be entered when making first deposit using this processor if player is linked to this profile.
PL.MAX_FIRST_AMT: This is the maximum amount that may be entered when making first deposit using this processor if player is linked to this profile.

IPL.MIN_FIRST_AMT: This is the minimum amount that may be entered when making first deposit using this processor (this overrides global player(GPL)/profile(PL) limits).
IPL.MAX_FIRST_AMT: This is the maximum amount that may be entered when making first deposit using this processor (this overrides global player(GPL)/profile(PL) limits).
